mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}FLW_CHANNEL_DEFINITION(ID_, CATEGORY_, NAME_, KEY_, VERSION_, TYPE_, IMPLEMENTATION_, DEPLOYMENT_ID_, CREATE_TIME_, RESOURCE_NAME_, DESCRIPTION_, TENANT_ID_) values (#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{implementation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deploymentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{resourceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ${prefix}FLW_CHANNEL_DEFINITION(ID_, CATEGORY_, NAME_, KEY_, VERSION_, TYPE_, IMPLEMENTATION_, DEPLOYMENT_ID_, CREATE_TIME_, RESOURCE_NAME_, DESCRIPTION_, TENANT_ID_) values
(#{channelDefinition.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.key, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.version, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelDefinition.type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.implementation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.deploymentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{channelDefinition.resourceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT ALL
INTO ${prefix}FLW_CHANNEL_DEFINITION(ID_, CATEGORY_, NAME_, KEY_, VERSION_, TYPE_, IMPLEMENTATION_, DEPLOYMENT_ID_, CREATE_TIME_, RESOURCE_NAME_, DESCRIPTION_, TENANT_ID_) VALUES (#{channelDefinition.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.key, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.version, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelDefinition.type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.implementation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.deploymentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{channelDefinition.resourceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDefinition.tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: select * from ${prefix}FLW_CHANNEL_DEFINITION where KEY_ = #{parameter.channelDefinitionKey} and VERSION_ = #{parameter.eventVersion} and (TENANT_ID_ = '' or TENANT_ID_ is null)

select * from ${prefix}FLW_CHANNEL_DEFINITION where KEY_ = #{channelDefinitionKey} and (TENANT_ID_ = '' or TENANT_ID_ is null) and VERSION_ = (select max(VERSION_) from ${prefix}FLW_CHANNEL_DEFINITION where KEY_ = #{channelDefinitionKey} and (TENANT_ID_ = '' or TENANT_ID_ is null))

select * from ${prefix}FLW_CHANNEL_DEFINITION where KEY_ = #{channelDefinitionKey} and TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId} and VERSION_ = (select max(VERSION_) from ${prefix}FLW_CHANNEL_DEFINITION where KEY_ = #{channelDefinitionKey} and TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId})
